member.name: T:DallENet.DallEOptions
member.summary: Options class that provides settings for configuring DALLE·E.

member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration settings for accessing the service.

member.name: P:DallENet.DallEOptions.DefaultResolution
member.summary: Gets or sets the default resolution for image generation (default: 1024x1024).

member.name: P:DallENet.DallEOptions.DefaultImageCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the default number of images to generate for a request. Must be between 1 and 5 (default: 1).

member.name: P:DallENet.DallEOptions.ThrowExceptionOnError
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to throw a when an error occurred (default: ). If this property is set to , API errors are returned in the object.

member.summary: Requests a new image generation.
member.param: A text description of the desired image(s). The maximum length is 1000 characters.
The number of images to generate. Must be between 1 and 5. If , the number set in the will be used (default: 1).
The size of the generated images. If , the resolution set in the will be used (default: 1024x1024).
A that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.exception: An error occurred while calling the API and the is .

member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC date and time at which the response has been generated.

member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC date and time at which the response will expire.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Id of the response.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Operation Id that identifies the original image generation request.

member.name: P:DallENet.Models.DallEImageGenerationResponse.Status
member.summary: Gets or sets the status of the response.
member.remarks: Possible values are: notRunning (task is queued but hasn't started yet), running, succeeded, canceled (task has timed out), failed, or deleted.

member.summary: Gets or sets the error occurred during the image generation execution, if any.
